31/12/2020 01/01/2020 500ml of 2000ml Add Drink Water Milk Coffee Tea Juices Facts To Know Flavoured Drinking
ADD TO YOUR KNOWLEDGE FLAVOUR YOUR DRINK
1. Drink 2 cups of water before every meal 2. Drink a glass of water after you wake up 3. Drink a glass of water before you go to bed 4. Drink a glass of water after you wake up 5. Keep a track of the container 6. Have more water than required if the climate is hot 7. If you are breastfeeding or pregnant you will need more water than an average person 8. If food with more sodium consumed you will need more water to flush it out 9. Add flavour to your water MORE ABOUT FLAVOURS
Learn More Few pieces of LIME , A CUCUMBER and A MINT plus your WATER Few pieces of LIME , A STRAWBERRY and A GINGER plus your WATER Few pieces of ORANGE , A FENNEL and A GINGER plus your WATER Few pieces of APPLE , A CINNAMON plus your WATER
